list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: place or fix (equipment or machinery) in position ready for use.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we're planning to install a new shower
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đang dự định cài đặt một vòi hoa sen mới

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: place (someone) in a new position of authority, especially with ceremony.
